history.content:
Interested in educational equity in tech or cs/data science ?

Opportunity Through Data (OTD) is recruiting for the Fall 2021 semester!

RSVP on Facebook @ OTD Recruitment Fall 2021

OTD is a Big Ideas funded data science education initiative that teaches introductory data science to underserved high school students and incarcerated women. Our goal is to make data science more accessible and equitable to these communities in hopes of diversifying the data science field. We are looking for members to join our Curriculum and Strategic Operations teams.

  • Fill out this interest form to get updates on the recruitment cycle: tinyurl.com/OTDinterestform
  • Learn more about us at our info session on Sep. 28th at 7:00 PM PT! Zoom Meeting link: tinyurl.com/OTDinfosesh
  • Our applications are due Friday, Oct. 1st at 11:59 PM PT and can be found here: tinyurl.com/Fall2021OTD

If you have any questions, please refer to our website (http://otd.berkeley.edu/) or contact us at apply@otd.berkeley.edu
history.subject: Join Opportunity Through Data!
